entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:02 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: WSW 56 km/h gust 87 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early this morning. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
